background: A patient is undergoing radiation treatment with two beams aimed to deliver medicine doses to both a benign area and a tumor, with a goal to minimize radiation received by the pancreas while adhering to maximum and minimum dose limits for the skin and tumor respectively.

parameters.definition: Dose of medicine delivered by Beam 1 per minute to the benign area of the pancreas
Dose of medicine delivered by Beam 1 per minute to the benign area of the skin
Dose of medicine delivered by Beam 2 per minute to the benign area of the pancreas
Dose of medicine delivered by Beam 2 per minute to the benign area of the skin
Dose of medicine delivered by Beam 1 per minute to the tumor
Dose of medicine delivered by Beam 2 per minute to the tumor
Maximum units of medicine the skin should receive
Minimum units of medicine the tumor should receive

constraints.description: Ensure that the minutes of Beam 1 used is non-negative
constraints.code:
# Ensure that the minutes of Beam 1 used is non-negative
model.addConstr(MinutesBeam1 >= 0, name="non_negative_MinutesBeam1")

constraints.description: The number of minutes Beam 2 is used is non-negative.
constraints.code: # Since the variable "MinutesBeam2" is already coded as a non-negative continuous variable, no additional code is needed.

constraints.description: The total dose of medicine delivered to the skin from both beams must not exceed the maximum allowable dose (MaxSkinDose).
constraints.code:
# Adding the constraint for maximum allowable skin dose
model.addConstr(DoseSkin1 * MinutesBeam1 + DoseSkin2 * MinutesBeam2 <= MaxSkinDose, name="max_skin_dose_constraint")

constraints.description: The tumor receives at least MinTumorDose units of medicine from both beams combined.
constraints.code:
# Add a constraint to ensure the tumor receives at least MinTumorDose units of medicine
model.addConstr(DoseTumor1 * MinutesBeam1 + DoseTumor2 * MinutesBeam2 >= MinTumorDose, name="tumor_min_dose")

constraints.description: Ensure the tumor receives at least the minimum required dose.
constraints.code:
# Ensure the tumor receives at least the minimum required dose
model.addConstr(
    DoseTumor1 * MinutesBeam1 + DoseTumor2 * MinutesBeam2 >= MinTumorDose, 
    name="min_tumor_dose"
)

constraints.description: Ensure the skin does not receive more than the maximum allowed dose.
constraints.code:
# Add skin dose constraint
model.addConstr(
    DoseSkin1 * MinutesBeam1 + DoseSkin2 * MinutesBeam2 <= MaxSkinDose,
    name="skin_dose_constraint"
)

variables.definition: The number of minutes Beam 1 is used in the radiation treatment
The number of minutes Beam 2 is used in the radiation treatment

objective.description: Minimize the total medicine dose received by the pancreas.
objective.code:
# Set objective
model.setObjective(DosePancreas1 * MinutesBeam1 + DosePancreas2 * MinutesBeam2, gp.GRB.MINIMIZE)
